product_name: Witz See It Safe Sport Case
long_description: Protect small ultra-valuable items like credit cards, ID cards, cash and keys with this small yet highly versatile See It Safe waterproof case. Waterproof design provides protection that no wallet can match. Built for outdoor activities or travel, this case can fit into a pocket, attach to a backpack or belt or hang around your neck. Translucent color lets you see contents. Nylon lanyard with breakaway clip.
short_description: Protect small ultra-valuable items like credit cards, ID cards, cash and keys with this small yet highly versatile See It Safe waterproof case.
